entry.title: Stranger [DC comics]
entry.summary:
Author: Madu_CC

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,862Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: A fallen entity inhabits Isobel's body, moving through Gotham’s corruption and chaos while seeking answers about its true nature. Its presence not only disrupts those around it but also unsettles the city's balance, drawing the attention of dangerous figures who threaten its plans.Is it a demon playing human, or something else?With Hell and Gotham as witnesses, the truth lurks in the shadows, waiting to be revealed.------------------------------------------------------------------------------OrBelial must deal with Isobel’s past, and Jason isn’t making it easy.

entry.title: Affairs and Letters
entry.summary:
Author: ToTheStars8

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,378Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 409

Summary: Secure in your position in the Kent household you are more than happy in your station in life. Yet, when the Wayne family enters the town, you are entranced by the second eldest son, Mr. Jason Todd. Between keeping your reputation intact as a polite young lady and dabbling into the follies of love, you’re caught in a scandalous affair that threatens the very thing you are trying to protect.Regency AU!

entry.title: The Shadows Hide The Shapes But Not The Lovers
entry.summary:
Author: treeteaofversailles

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,213Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 26

Summary: You teared up a bit at how sincere he was being. You quickly deflected and sighed softly. “You sound like… Ted Lasso.”“Babygirl, I will bend you right over the bed again and make sure you say the right name.” Jason glared at you, but there was no real heat in his eyes. You laughed, and that made him smile. “But I am serious, doll. You’re beautiful. Don’t let anyone else try to say otherwise.”~Tldr: College!Reader gets harassed by an Original Character. There is some behind the scenes comfort with College!Jason Todd alongside explicit sex as he helps Reader feel better. He calls you "beautiful" a lot. Also kinda implied that Original Character likes Jason Todd and doesn't like Reader.

entry.title: Dear Daddy Long Legs
entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,391Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 327

Summary: “I’m looking for an application for a scholarship.”“You didn’t have to hack our systems to apply for a scholarship,” Tim deadpanned, “I wasn’t aware you could go to college if you’re legally dead.”His eye twitched. “I’m looking for an applicant,” he amended, “She already applied.”Tim finally looked at him. “She?”_____Inspired by the novel Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster. Jason Todd saves you from getting mugged one night and ends up being your mysterious benefactor, funding your college experience. Featuring awkward "zero rizz" Jason Todd and several members of the Bat Family.Jason Todd x Fem!Reader - does not use y/n

entry.title: Little Red
entry.summary:
Author: forestpixie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,462Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Jason Todd had taken control of the underground drug trafficking in Gotham as The Red Hood, by using methods his former mentor Bruce Wayne would never approve of.All of that so he could confront him and make him choose between killing the Joker or him. After the big fight, he was brought back to the manor to recover from the injuries the explosion caused. He refused, as expected, to move back in, still finding it difficult to look Bruce in the face, but he kept in contact, sometimes being called in by one of his bat-siblings to assist on a mission, thanksgiving dinner, or just an overly complicated prank.A couple of years later, just when things seemed to finally calm down, when Jason started to believe he could be a part of the Wayne family, the Joker’s goons are seen back in town, looking for someone. Looking for her.
